tags.cf-questions: A little bit about myself: I'm currently working as iOS Engineer at United Technical Services, Abu Dhabi.&&In my free time I love to learn more about CS concepts, watch movies, play basketball and like to take photos!&&You can read my blog on Medium.&&You can also see all my open-source projects on GitHub.&&If you would like to talk to me, whenever I get out of this darn website, my email is aj.jobins@gmail.com
